meaningMnemonic: Wipe your <radical>fingers</radical> on this <radical>table</radical> in <radical>winter</radical> to see what it was <kanji>based on</kanji>. The cold winter weathers cover the table in frost, and when you wipe it away, you can see traces of what the table was originally based on. All tables have to be based on something, even if it's just other tables that came before them.
readingMnemonic: This particular table was <kanji>based on</kanji> Little <reading>Kyo</reading>to (きょ). Little buildings and temples, that sort of look like Little Kyoto. Problem is, it was made by a <reading>子</reading> (こ), so it's not very good.
